Afterwards one of the Heracross who grew fond of Ash and his Bulbasaur decided to accompany him on his Johto journey. Heracross was sent to Professor Oak in exchange for one of his Tauros, however, when Ash wanted to trade back Professor asked for more time to study Heracross to which Ash agreed. Heracross was eventually recalled and it competed with Ash as his trainer in the Silver Conference but remained at Oak`s Laboratory when Ash departed for the Hoenn region. It is a strong, loyal yet slightly docile Pokémon whose feats of strength include lifting a big mechanical Pinsir and defeating Gary Oak`s Magmar at the Silver Conference despite a type disadvantage.

character.name: Gomazou (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash received a Phanpy egg as a prize after he won a race.

character.name: Crobat (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Crobat stayed at the Pewter Gym while he traveled.

character.name: Foretos (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock caught Forretress as a Pineco near Azalea Town with one of Kurt`s Fast Balls while trying to pick Apricorns.

character.name: Purin
character.description: Ash, Misty and Brock helped this Jigglypuff sing by improving its voice. Ever since, this Jigglypuff can appeared in numerous places attempting to find someone or a Pokémon which can listen to the whole of its song. This Jigglypuff can be identified by the marker pen it carries which it used to draw on people or Pokémon who fall asleep while listening to its song.

character.name: Maril (Kenji)
character.description: Tracey`s Marill was revealed when Tracey decided that he needed a good Pokémon to help him find the Crystal Onix. Tracey`s Marill has very sensitive ears that can detect distant sounds and the round, rubbery tip of its tail can expand and contract, assisting Marill in the water. While swimming, Tracey`s Marill tail floats so he can see where it`s going. Misty realized that Tracey and his Marill make a good team as Tracey`s Marill could hear a Pokémon long before Tracey could even see it. Tracey would often play a Pokémon cry on his dex for Marill to help it learn what the Pokémon sounded like so it could search for that particular Pokémon. Tracey`s Marill ears would twitch when it was searching or it found something.

character.name: Gardie (Junsaa)
character.description: Officer Jenny`s Growlithe which are regularly used as a part of the Police Force.

character.name: Police Officer
character.description: A member of the Police Force

character.name: Nyarth
character.description: Meowzie used to be a very pampered pet belonging to a rich lady and was even kept in a jewel encrusted Pokéball. Meowth first met Meowzie when he was just a street cat and fell in love with Meowzie. Although, Meowzie rejected him as her owner could buy her anything she wanted and Meowth could offer her nothing. After Meowth attempted to make himself more human by learning to walk on two legs and learning how to talk, Meowzie still rejected him as she thought she had turned into a freak cat. However, after losing her fortunate, the rich lady abandoned Meowzie in the city of Hollywood and Meowzie wandered the street until she joined a local gang of Meowth led by a Persian. It was in fact, the same gang Meowth had been apart of when he was a street cat but Meowth had already left Hollywood by this time. When Meowth returned to Hollywood he was suprised to find Meowzie when the street gang and wanted to take her away. Meowth defeated the gang leader Persian in a duel but Meowzie once again shunned Meowth instead deciding to stay with Persian as it was the Pokémon that took her in during her time of need.

character.name: Tamaranze-kaichou
character.description: Charles Goodshow is the president of the Pokémon League and governs the tournaments held accross different tournaments including Kanto, Johto and Heonn. He is also responsible for the Moltres flame which he uses to keep the torches held by the runners lit. When he saw Ash Ketchum`s spirit and attitude he allowed Ash, Misty and Brock be a runner and hold the events torch lit by the Moltress flame

character.name: Shinpan
character.description: The Pokémon battle referees officiate the battles taking place in the Pokémon League. The make the deciding call when declaring that a Pokémon is fainted and therefore eliminating it from the battle. They can also disqualify a Pokémon or even a Trainer if they are breaking the rules. In the Indigo League the referees had blue shirts on whilst for the final of the Orange League they had Orange shirts on.

character.name: Delibird (Rocket-dan)
character.description: Team Rocket`s Delibird delivers parcels to field agents around the world.

character.name: Odamaki-hakase

character.name: Bursyamo (Hazuki)

character.name: Mary
character.description: Mary is a member of the Pokémon Mystery Club.

character.name: Wataru

character.name: Gyarados (Wataru)
character.description: Lance`s Gyarados is red rather than its usual blue.

character.name: Kairyu (Wataru)
character.description: Lance`s Dragonite helped stop the legendary battle between Kyogre and Groudon.

character.name: Shijima
character.description: Chuck is the Gym Leader of the Cianwood Gym.

character.name: Haruka
character.description: Haruka is a Pokemon Coordinator from Petalburg City. Starting off her journey, Haruka did not like Pokemon very much. She originally wanted to be a Pokemon Trainer so she could travel and see the world. On the day she got her starter Pokemon, http://anidb.net/ch23625 [Achamo], Haruka met Satoshi and like Kasumi was impressed by Satoshi`s personality. She traveled with Satoshi, her brother Masato and Takeshi until she decided to part ways an compete in the Johto region. Having decided to focus on being a Pokemon Coordinator instead of a Pokemon Trainer, Haruka experience great success during the many Contests she entered. She has competed in the Kanto and Houen Grand Festivals as well as the Wallace Cup where she reached the finals only to loose to Hikari. Haruka is also popular with the fanboys for her well endowed feminine body features. She isn`t shy about showing off her body as well by posing in her various swimming attire.

character.name: Masato
character.description: Masato is the younger sibling of http://anidb.net/ch23585 [Haruka]. He lives in Petalburg City with his family. He traveled with Satoshi, Takeshi and his sister Haruka throughout Houen and Kanto. He returned home after his sister went to Johto and Satoshi and Takeshi went to Sinnoh. Masato knows a lot about Pokemon even though he is quite young. He tries to learn as much about Pokemon as he can so that when he turns 10, he will be prepared to start his own journey to become a great Pokemon Trainer. Since Kasumi was no longer traveling with Takeshi and Satoshi, Masato took up the role of dragging Takeshi away from the girls by the ear.

character.name: Eipam (Hikari)
character.description: Ash captured this originally pesky Pokémon during the Grand Festival. He later traded it to Dawn in exchange for Buizel.

character.name: Donfan (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Donphan evolved during a battle against Team Rocket.

character.name: Kimori (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Treecko was first seen helping Ash attempt to save his old tree home.

character.name: Juptile (Satoshi)

character.name: Jukain (Satoshi)

character.name: Ohsubame (Satoshi)

character.name: Subame (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Taillow was the leader of a flock of Taillow.

character.name: Mizugorou (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Mudkip lived in a preserve run by Old Man Swamp. Brock first met the Mudkip after they both helped rescue a baby Mudkip on the preserve. Later another baby Mudkip fell off the cliff and Brock`s Mudkip managed to rescue it but was caught on a rock. It`s trust in Brock increased after Brock rescued it from the waterfall and also when they worked together to fed off Team Rocket. After rescuing the baby Mudkips from Team Rocket, Old Man Swamp noticed how well the older Mudkip got along with Brock and he suggested that it should journey with Brock.

character.name: Numacraw (Takeshi)
character.description: Mudkip evolved into a Marshtomp during a training battle versus Ash`s Grovyle.

character.name: Hassboh (Takeshi)
character.description: Lotad lived near the Flower Shop between Petalburg City and Rustboro City.

character.name: Hasubrero (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Lombre evolved right after Brock rescued it from a well.

character.name: Runpappa (Takeshi)
character.description: Lombre was searching through Samantha`s belongings and discovering a Water Stone. Touching the Water Stone triggered its evolution into Ludicolo.

character.name: Usohachi (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock captured Bonsly while Ash, May, Max and himself were training at a ninja school.

character.name: Sukizou-san
character.description: Sukizou rarely says much except his catch phrase "I like it" (好きですね). In the English dub, his phrase is "Remarkable".

character.name: Contesta
character.description: Contesta is the main Pokémon contest judge.

character.name: Elekible (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: Gary`s Electivire first appearance was just outside Pallet Town. It was shooting at apples with its Thunderbolt until Team Rocket attempted to take it by capturing it in an electricity-proof net.

character.name: Hinata
character.description: Solana is a Pokémon Ranger who has climbed up the ranks and is now a rank 10 ranger. She likes to have information on the Pokémon she is helping and is often seen with her Plusle riding on her shoulder. Ash and his friends first encountered Solana in the Kanto region as she was investigating the strange growth of some vines in a forest. It ended up that Celebi was there and with Ash`s help they were able to care for the injured Celebi. She once again met up with Ash and friends when she was sent to investigate geomagnetic interference. Upon further investigation it was discovered that Deoxys was in the vicinity and had crashed on the planet in a meteor impact a few years earlier. After befriending Max, Deoxys decided that it wanted to explore more of the world and Solana was able to report back to the Ranger Union that the mission was completed. While in the Sinnoh region, Ash encountered a rare Riolu that knew how to use Aura Sphere. It had been kidnapped from the Lucario Kingdom. Kellyn and Solana, where sent to track it down and with the strong bond Riolu made with Ash, the Riolu was returned back home. It is said that when at first she met Kellyn in the Sinnoh region, she was jealous of his popularity with the girls because of his ranking and of his looks. She then heard that he didn`t ever notice the girls, and was assigned to work with her. At first, she barley talked to him, she found a liking of him when she saw how good and humble he was when they succeeded.

character.name: Pyramid King Jindai
character.description: Pyramid King Brandon is a Frontier Brain and chief of the Battle Frontier`s Battle Pyramid. He is a known explorer as he travels around the world in his Pyramid in search of rare and unique Pokémon. He is also a very formidable battling opponent who will gives his challengers advice on their strategies for battling him if they lose. Those that defeat him are awarded the Battle Frontier Brave Symbol. Ash first battle Brandon while he was possessed by the spirit of the King of Pokélantis. Brandon defeated the possessed Ash but he allowed a rematch due to the circumstances. He told Ash in advance that he would be using Registeel for the battle. In their first normal Frontier challenge battle, Brandon defeated Ash with his Registeel even though Ash`s Torkoal battle well. Brandon once again agreed to battle Ash but he first had to go in search of a rare Pokémon. In his final battle against Ash, he decided to have a 4-on-4 battle instead of the 1-on-1 battles they had in the previous fights. Brandon used his Dusclops, Ninjask, Solrock, and Regice which Ash managed to defeat with his Charizard, Bulbasaur, Squirtle and Pikachu. Brandon was impressed with how well Ash had trained his Pokémon as well has how mature a battler he had become. Brandon appeared with his Pyramid in the at Sinnoh region`s Snowpoint Temple where he once again met up with Ash. While there Paul showed up and it was revealed that Paul`s brother Reggie had once battled against Brandon for the Battle Frontier Brave Symbol and lost. Paul challenged Brandon and lost in a 6-on-6 full battle. Brandon encountered a Regigigas at the Snowpoint Temple after Pokémon Hunter J attempted to revive and capture it. With Brandon`s help, and help from Brandon`s Regi`s, Regigigas was returned to the temple and Brandon promised to watch over the temple.

character.name: Regice (Pyramid King Jindai)
character.description: Brandon captured Regice in between Overjoyed! and Gathering the Gang of Four! while searching in a ruin.

character.name: Pelipper (Antony)

character.name: Madatsubomi (Antony)

character.name: Coil (Antony)

character.name: Rustboro Gym Roudousha
character.description: The Rustboro Gym Worker was first seen fixing the battlefield of the Rustboro Gym. He later was the officiator for the Gym Battle between Ash and Roxanne.

character.name: Nosepass (Tsutsuji)
character.description: Roxanne`s Nosepass appeared a gym battle against Ash.

character.name: Tsuwabuki Shachou
character.description: Mr. Stone is the president of Devon Corporation.

character.name: Kuroda

character.name: Shizariger (Aqua-dan Grunt)

character.name: Hagi Roujin

character.name: Camome (Hagi Roujin)
character.description: Mr. Briney`s Wingull (Peeko) was captured by a Team Aqua agent and later rescued by Ash and his friends.

character.name: Touki
character.description: Brawly is the Gym Leader of the Dewford Gym.

character.name: Makunoshita (Touki)
character.description: Brawly`s Makuhita knows how to surf.

character.name: Hariteyama (Touki)
character.description: Brawly`s Hariyama knows how to surf.

character.name: Wanriky (Touki)
character.description: Brawly`s Machop was first seen during Ash`s first Gym Battle against Brawly.

character.name: Tsuwabuki Daigo
character.description: Steven is the son of the president of the Devon Corporation. Steven is also the Elite Four Champion in the Houen Region.

character.name: Cokodora (Tsuwabuki Daigo)
character.description: Steven Stone`s Aron helps him find precious stones and gems.

character.name: Bossgodora (Tsuwabuki Daigo)
character.description: Steven Stone`s Aggron was called out to stop Team Rocket.

character.name: Karasalis (Haruka)
character.description: May`s Silcoon evolved at the same time as Jessie`s Cascoon.

character.name: Numata Roujin
character.description: Old Man Swamp runs a Mudkip preserve. Ash and his friends first met him just after the baby Mudkip was rescued. He got mad at the group because he thought they were disturbing the Mudkip. He quickly changed his attitude after they told him they rescued the baby Mudkip. He invited them to his house and he showed him the Mudkip eggs that he was watching. He explained to Ash and company that he was looking to find a trainer who can take care of the older wild Mudkip. Later after watching one of the Mudkip eggs hatch, Old Man Swamp heard one of his alarms go off and quickly went to find out what the problem was. Finding out that Team Rocket was causing problems and that they wanted to capture the Mudkips, he was not happy. After rescuing the baby Mudkips from Team Rocket, Old Man Swamp noticed how well the older Mudkip got along with Brock and he suggested that it should journey with Brock.

character.name: Stephanie`s Father
character.description: Stephanie`s father brought his daughter to the local Pokémon Center where Nurse Joy had 3 starter Pokémon ready for his daughter to choose. Combusken evolved and was not available as a starter Pokémon for his daughter. When it finally came time for his daughter to choose a starter Pokémon she chose Mudkip. Treecko and Stephanie`s Father liked each other from the time they met and he asked Nurse Joy if he could keep Treecko.

character.name: Stephanie
character.description: Stephanie`s father brought her to the local Pokemon Center where Nurse Joy had 3 starter Pokemon ready for her to choose from. The starter Torchic that Nurse Joy had ready for Stephanie to pick from escaped from Max and Ash and evolved into a Combusken. With the evolved Torchic not available as a starter Pokemon for her to choose from, she chose Mudkip without hesitation anyhow.

character.name: Mudkip (Stephanie)
character.description: Stephanie`s Mudkip was the Pokemon she chose as her starter Pokemon. Stephanie`s father brought her to the local Pokemon Center where Nurse Joy had 3 starter Pokemon ready for her to choose from. The starter Torchic that Nurse Joy had ready for Stephanie to pick from escaped from Max and Ash and evolved into a Combusken. With the evolved Torchic not available as a starter Pokemon for her to choose from, she chose Mudkip without hesitation anyhow.

character.name: Treecko (Stephanie`s Father)
character.description: Stephanie`s Father`s Treecko was first seen when Max released the starter Pokemon in the Pokemon Center. Treecko followed Ash and Max after they went to get the Torchic that escaped. Ash had already released his Treecko and it was obvious that Treecko liked Ash`s Treecko. Treecko and Stephanie`s Father liked each other from the time they met and he asked Nurse Joy if he could keep Treecko.

Watt is shocked about Wattson`s lost but he declares that Pikachu wins the first round.

character.description: Hank competed in a contest to see who would be the next king for a year.

character.name: Nosepass (Hiyoshi)
character.description: Hank`s Nosepass was sent out to help them navigate through the mountains.

character.name: Zeus
character.description: Zeus was the king of a village in the Kanto Region.

character.name: Anri
character.description: Ada is a traveling comedian.

character.name: Perap (Anri)
character.description: Ada`s Chatot is part of Ada`s comedy act.

character.name: Chizuru
character.description: Corinna is a patient at the Children`s Hospital.

character.name: Children`s Hospital Staff
character.description: Children`s Hospital Staff take care of the sick children.

character.name: Kawada
character.description: Kerrigan is part of the Wilderness Guard Core.

character.name: Butterfree (Shuu)
character.description: Drew`s Butterfree was seen in a battle against May.

character.name: Mike
character.description: Matt is in charge of a Pokémon Day Care center.

character.name: Samayouru (Pyramid King Jindai)
character.description: Brandon`s Dusclops was seen battling Ash`s Charizard during the rematch battle.

character.name: Tekkanin (Pyramid King Jindai)
character.description: Ash`s Squirtle defeated Brandon`s Ninjask.

character.name: Solrock (Pyramid King Jindai)
character.description: Brandon`s Solrock defeated Ash`s Squirtle.

character.name: Announcer
character.description: The Pokemon Contest Announcer for the Terracotta Town Special Contest.

character.name: Hanabi Shokunin no Oyakata
character.description: The older Pyrotechnician helped setup the fireworks at the end of the day that were shaped as different Pokemon.

character.name: Kameil (Shigeki)
character.description: Stefano battled against May with his Wartortle at the Shidake Town Pokémon Contest.

character.name: Kamex (Giambi)
character.description: Johnny`s Blastoise participated in the Double battle rounds of the Ever Grande Conference. It was only seen on the scoreboard as it had already been knocked out when Ash and his friends sat down to watch the remainder of the battle.

character.name: Ruffresia (Shiromi)
character.description: Nicolette`s Vileplume was defeated by May`s Munchlax after Munchlax learned Focus Punch.

character.name: Kairyu (Ookido Yukinari-hakase)
character.description: Professor Oak`s Dragonite was first seen in the The Mastermind of Mirage Pokémon special. It was sent out to protect Professor Oak, Ash and his friends as well as the other Pokémon from Mewtwo.

character.name: Doctor Yung
character.description: Dr. Yung was the inventor of the Mirage Pokémon system which created Pokémon out of thin air. Yung invited Professor Oak to come see his work and Ash and his friends came along as well. Dr. Yung ended up being an evil scientist and it was revealed that he was the mysterious Mirage Master.

character.name: Heart Break Patcheel
character.description: A wild Spinda with a broken heart on its head.

character.name: Pokemon Zukan
character.description: The first generation of the Hoenn Pokedex and the Pokedex of the third generation.

character.name: Pokemon Zukan
character.description: The first generation of the Shin`ou Pokedex and the Pokedex of the fourth generation.

Senritsu no Mirage Pokemon
episode.summary: Dr. Yung, an enigmatic Pokémon scientist, has developed a new Mirage system that uses computer data to resurrect extinct Pokémon, like Kabutops and Armaldo. Professor Oak, Ash and his companions show up at the Mirage Mansion at Dr. Yung`s invitation, and watch a demonstration of the machine`s capabilities. In the middle of a battle between Dr. Yung`s Mirage Pokémon and Ash, the machine goes haywire and a Mirage Aerodactyl swoops in and kidnaps Dr. Yung. A man calling himself "The Mirage Master" appears and announces to everyone that the Mirage System can be used to create Pokémon with absolutely no weaknesses. Ash, Misty, and Professor Oak struggle to stop the madman and escape with their lives.
